name: single-spa-portal-example-react
description: React App that will be bundled into a library to be loaded on demand by a simpleSPA Portal App

scripts.watch:portal: cd ./scripts && npm i && npm run watch:portal
scripts.build:portal: cd ./scripts && npm i && npm run build:portal
scripts.serve:portal: cd ./scripts && npm i && npm run build:portal && node_modules/.bin/http-server ../release -p 9001

author: Michael Ruecker
